en.title: FE's Mandarin SON Empress Hotel, 12th-13th Sept 2008
en.content:
FE's recent Mandarin School of Networking (SON) at the Empress Hotel, Nilai, 12th - 13th September 2008, was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 62 enthusiastic and eager FE Leaders and Members. Participants had a great time learning invaluable Leadership Skills, Presentation Skills, Goal Setting, Overcoming Challenges, etc.

A BIG THANK YOU to Trainers Leny Painan and Jacky Cheng and to FE Presidential Directors James Ng, Amy Teh, Tilly Kong, Allan Yeo, Joyce Tan, Goh Thian Chai and Kenny Yick. FE appreciates your time and committment in leading and training your team to become world class leaders whereupon they in turn can lead and train countless others and keep the legacy and success of FE into the future!

SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP !
